wip.title: Work-in-progress flag
wip.description: Should be set to true if this game entry is missing information or has not yet been confirmed to be correct.

specifications.title: Game specification list
specifications.description: List of known specification codes used by this game (GX, GE, GN and so on).

code.title: Game code
code.description: The 3-digit code that uniquely identifies this game (700-999 or A00-A99 ~ D00-D99).

regions.title: Game region and version list
regions.description: List of known region and version codes used by this game. If different versions of the game have different names, specifications or hardware, each variant should be a separate entry in the game list with the same code.

identifiers.title: MAME game identifier list
identifiers.description: The names used by MAME to identify this game, one for each region/version listed in the regions field. Use an empty string for versions not currently emulated by MAME.

name.title: Game name
name.description: The full name of this game.

series.title: Series name
series.description: The full name of the series this game belongs to, if any. Games that belong to the same series will be grouped together.

year.title: Year
year.description: The year this game came out in.

ioBoard.title: I/O board PCB type
ioBoard.description: The I/O expansion board required by this game. Omit if the game does not need any.

bootloaderVersion.title: Bemani bootloader version
bootloaderVersion.description: Version number of the Bemani bootloader used by this game. Omit if the game has no bootloader.

rtcHeader.title: RTC RAM header
rtcHeader.description: Object describing the header written by the game to the first 32 bytes of RTC RAM. Omit if the game does not write a header to RTC RAM.

flashHeader.title: Internal flash header
flashHeader.description: Object describing the header written by the game to the first 32 bytes of the internal flash memory. Omit if the game does not write a header to the flash.

installCart.title: Installation cartridge
installCart.description: Object describing the game's installation security cartridge. Omit if the game needs no such cartridge.

gameCart.title: Game cartridge
gameCart.description: Object describing the game's main security cartridge. Omit if the game needs no such cartridge.
